title: Simple Azure VM Provisioning
description: A simple Azure VM provisioning using Terraform with taking care of all the security measesures.
Technologies: Terraform, Azure, Azure Storage, github actions

title: Terraform Azure Infrastructure with GitHub Actions CI/CD
description: This project automates the provisioning of Azure infrastructure using Terraform modules, executed through GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines. It supports multi-environment deployments (dev, stage, and prod) with isolated backends and reusable modules.
Technologies: Terraform, Azure, Azure Storage, Azure Key Vault, github actions, azure databases , azure network

title: Love Calculator
description: A fun and simple Love Calculator built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.Enter two names and get a compatibility score with playful visuals and confetti animations.
Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Docker, github actions, github pages

title: React Tic Tac Toe Game - Full DevOps Deployment
description: A feature-rich, mobile-responsive Tic Tac Toe game built with ReactJS and deployed on Azure via a fully automated DevOps pipeline using Docker, Terraform, and GitHub Actions. can be found at https://saketvishwakarma.github.io/tic-tac-toe-mern/
Technologies: ReactJS, Docker, Terraform, Azure, GitHub Actions, trivy , docker hub , azure web app, vercel

title: Portfolio Website
description: Welcome to my personal portfolio site! This project highlights my skills, experience, and featured projects as a developer and DevOps/data enthusiast.
